name: Haunted House - Adventure Game
description:
Haunted House

Welcome to Haunted House!  A hybrid text and graphical adventure game for Windows!

Explore 3 floors of a haunted house to find the secret ghostly spell books.

Collect items around the house and use them on other items.  You have to pick things up, open things, push/pull things, use things on other things, walk in and out of different rooms.

Easy to navigate interface allowing you to select which action you wish to perform on either a room item or an inventory item.

The game comes with sound effects.

Up to 4 people can play, and save their games separately.

Takes between 1-3 hours to complete.

Thanks for looking!
